hello , need help with installing new fi: how do i know which version i have?
do you have the dapper-security repositories enabled?
are you comfortable understanding and editing /etc/apt/sources.list or would you like some help with that?
it's preferred (and also easier) to use the repositories
post the contents of your current /etc/apt/sources.list if you want on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org and give us a link
yep you seem to have security enabled, type this: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install firefox
let me know if that works, you can check what version you have of firefox with 'apt-cache policy firefox'
